participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I take pride in my appearance. I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery. I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire. I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own. I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: I enjoy a variety of activities, including spending time with my family and friends, going for walks with my dog, and relaxing by myself. I have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures. I have kids, and we enjoy spending time together. I'm a night owl and I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours. I love the memories of my senior prom and how happy I was that day.

content.text: It's going great, thanks! I just got back from a walk with my dog.
That sounds nice. I love dogs! I have a little chihuahua named Lucy.
Oh cute! I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
What a great name! I love golden retrievers.
Thanks! They are the best dogs. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go for walks, and relax by myself.
That sounds nice. I like to do a lot of the same things. I also love going to concerts and sporting events.
I love concerts too! I'm going to see Lady Gaga next month.
Oh wow! I love Lady Gaga! I'm going to see her in concert too!
That's awesome! We should go together!
That would be great! I'll text you my number.
